scene_description_enriched: Two male figures, identified as bishops by their miters and staffs, stand facing each other. The figure on the left wears a pink cope over a white alb and holds a pastoral staff in his left hand and a horn in his right. The figure on the right wears a blue chasuble over a white alb and holds a pastoral staff in his left hand and a pair of tongs in his right. Both figures have golden halos. The background is a decorative pattern of red and blue diamonds with gold accents. The floor is a green and black checkered pattern. The scene is framed by a border of green and gold.
